replies.author: huiahdu555
replies.txt_content: LZ我看你要写就写一鸣惊人的歌词

挖出個洞，又是一次幫我累積分數的時刻 Strike rich on diamonds, iron, gold and build our decked out fortress 去取得大量的鑽石、鐵、金，來裝飾我的堡壘。 All we need is just a bit of luck to not abort this 我們只需要點運氣，別讓我們停止 Runnin' low we can't afford this 低效率我們可承擔不起 Dungeons under here 來到地下城這 Just the last time a group of creepers came out over there 剛有一批苦力怕(Creppers)出現在這 Blew up a vein of diamonds then chased us all out of there 炸毀一批鑽石礦還把逼退了我們 A spider army dropped down from the roof into our hair 一批蜘蛛大軍從上掉到我們身上 Ran back to fresh air 逃回家，吸點新鮮空氣 This ain't your land, you're gonna get banned 這可不是你該來的地方，你會被Ban的 So you know, hey, 所以你知道的！嘿！ When you plan to go, hey 當你打算的時候！嘿！ When you're diggin', you'd better listen 當你挖礦時，最好聽請清楚了 So you know, hey, 所以你知道的！嘿！ When they gonna show, hey, 當他們準備好時！嘿！ Makin' sure you're all prepared before you go 勸你最好準備好了再走 Diggin' Minecraft style 挖掘創世神風格 Minecraft style 創世神風格 Dig, dig, dig, dig, diggin' Minecraft style 挖、挖、挖、挖、挖掘創世神風格 Minecraft style 創世神風格 Dig, dig, dig, dig, diggin' Minecraft style 挖、挖、挖、挖、挖掘創世神風格 Ay, sexy piggy 嘿~ 性感的小豬 Dig, dig, dig, dig, diggin' Minecraft style 挖、挖、挖、挖、挖掘創世神風格 Ay, sexy piggy 嘿~~ 性感的小豬 Dig, dig, dig, dig 挖、挖、挖、挖 Back on the ground we layin' redstone through the forest 回到陸地上，鋪設我們的紅石電路 To wire our monster traps so all the zombies will ignore us 去連結我們怪物陷阱，僵屍就不會再找我們麻煩 We built this city block by block and we don't welcome tourists 一塊一塊的建立我們的城市，我們可不歡迎遊客 But they still come lookin' for us 但他們總是會來找我們 Like a sauna here 這裡就像蒸汽浴一樣 We built a portal to the nether lava everywhere 我們建立了個裡面充滿岩漿的地獄門 Zombie pigs and ghasts flyin' all around so tread with care 僵屍豬以及水母飛行在周遭，讓我們走得非常緊張 Best you craft some armor and exchange that for the clothes you wear 你最好做點鎧甲，換點更好的衣服 While you're under here 才下來這裡 Lava flowin', those lakes are glowin' 岩漿流動著，這些湖泊灼熱的發光著 Down below, hey 在這下面！嘿！ You should probably go, hey 你應該來看看！嘿！ But you're ready, your arms are steady, 但你應該準備好，穩住你自己 Grab your bow, hey 拉好你的弓！嘿！ Shoot the fatal blow, hey 射出致命的一箭！嘿！ Run away now 'cause you missed you were too slow 然後快點跑，因為當你發覺失誤就太慢了 Diggin' Minecraft style 挖掘創世神風格 Minecraft style 創世神風格 Dig, dig, dig, dig, diggin' Minecraft style 挖、挖、挖、挖、挖掘創世神風格 Minecraft style 創世神風格 Dig, dig, dig, dig, diggin' Minecraft style 挖、挖、挖、挖、挖掘創世神風格 Ayyyyyyyyyy sexy piggy 嘿耶~~ 性感的小豬 Dig, dig, dig, dig, diggin' Minecraft style 挖、挖、挖、挖、挖掘創世神風格 Ayyyyyyyyyy sexy piggy 喔耶~ 性感的小豬 Dig, dig, dig, dig 挖、挖、挖、挖 Dig some more 挖更多 Until you hit the core 直到挖到地核 Diamonds, diamonds baby that's what we're all lookin' for 鑽石阿、鑽石，那寶貝才是我們追尋的 Dig some more 挖得更多 Until you hit the core 直到挖到地核 When you find 'em baby then you know it's time to soar 你知道找到那寶貝要花多少時間 Ain't a game we're playin 我們可不是在玩遊戲 Diggin' Minecraft style 挖掘創世神風格 Ay sexy piggy 喔~~ 性感的小豬 Dig, dig, dig, dig,
